ELEMIS: You're already on the list! Check out what's new. https://elemis.attn.tv/cl/wMn
Elemis customer service
I need some help. I believe I placed an order today, but I've not received confirmation. Can you confirm please?

ELEMIS: Hi! This is Charlotte of Elemis. I see an order placed today for the following products: Balm & Bright Cleansing Trio, Pro-Collagen Night Cream 2ml, and Pro-Collagen Rose Cleansing Balm 3g. Just to be sure, could you please check if you received a confirmation email or if there's a charge on your account? Sometimes the email might arrive in your spam or promo folder, so be sure to take a look there too!
I see nothing in my email or spam accounts
ELEMIS: I'm sorry about that. Can you please check if you've been charged? Let me know if the charge on your account shows as pending or posted.
Sorry for the delay it is on the card it's pending

ELEMIS: No problem! If you didn't receive a confirmation email, your order may not have gone through. If the charge on your account is still showing as pending, it means the payment hasn't been completed yet. It should either be refunded within 24 - 48 hours or go through successfully. If it's refunded, you can try placing the order again. If it processes, you'll receive a confirmation email shortly. Let me know if this helps!
Ok I'll check tomorrow. Maybe because today is a holiday things are delayed
ELEMIS: Sounds good! Feel free to reach out to us if you need any help or updates with your order.
Just a follow up- the charge went through on my credit card however I've not received a confirmation email
ELEMIS: I understand your concern. Please check your spam and promo folders as well, as our emails sometimes end up there.
I've checked no email
ELEMIS: Thanks for checking, and I'm really sorry for the trouble. Just to be sure, are you checking the email associated with your order?
Yes

ELEMIS: Thanks for confirming, and apologies for the inconvenience! Since you already received the charged in your account, you'll receive a confirmation email soon. Please always check your spam and promo folders as well, as our emails sometimes end up there. We appreciate your understanding!
I'll keep you updated
Can you confirm that my order is being processed?
ELEMIS: Let me check this further with my team. Can I please have the email you used to place the order?
